actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit use of Federal funds to pay for, promote or encourage abortions except where necessary to save the life of the mother.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds to pay for, promote, or encourage abortions which are not necessary to save the life of the mother.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit use of Federal funds to pay for, promote or encourage abortions except where necessary to save the life of the mother.
